item.title: Rose in Lying in the Gutters
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Steve Pugh is one of my all time fave comic artists. He's currently working with Brian Kirsten on "Rose From The Ashes", a six issue Victorian mystery comic series, out early next year, It looks gorgeous. Check out the thumbnail for LITG Rich is using on the front page of CBR! So sweet.
